__e: It must have been very hard to live under the shadow of the Wraith.
Hey, if they want our help killing other Wraith, that's one kind of help I'm happy to provide.
They figured out a way to hide from the rest of the galaxy, including the Wraith, and they're happy to go on with their lives, just minding their own business.
The Wraith are right behind us.
Well most of our sensors are still down, but we do know that there are at least a handful of Wraith still in the city.
If this is to be our end, it is best we face it with both dignity and honour. - I have an idea... in addition to panic. - Let's hear it.
I will let her know, but first I have to get her and my people to safety before the Wraith arrive.
